mapper.sql: t_user.user_id as user_id, stu_id, tell_num, class_name, gender, stu_name, sign_up_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_id, stu_id, tell_num, class_name, gender, stu_name, open_id,sign_up_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tellNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=BINARY},#{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user
user_id,
stu_id,
tell_num,
class_name,
gender,
stu_name,
open_id,
sign_up_time,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tellNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=BIT},
#{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{openId,jdbcType=BINARY},
#{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_user
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tell_num = #{tellNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT},
stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=BINARY},
sign_up_time=#{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{openId,jdbcType=BINARY}

update t_user set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tell_num = #{tellNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=BINARY} , sign_up_time=#{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tell_num = #{tellNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_up_time=#{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.tag_id as tag_id, tag_name, tag_show from t_tag a inner join t_user_tag tut on a.tag_id = tut.tag_id where tut.user_id=#{user_id}

select a.user_id as userId, a.class_name as className, a.gender as gender, a.stu_id as stuId, a.stu_name as stuName, a.tell_num as tellName, a.sign_up_time as signUpTime DATE_FORMAT(a2.join_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as joinTime from t_user a inner join t_user_activity a2 on a.user_id = a2.user_id where a2.activity_id=#{activityId} limit #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from t_user_activity where activity_id=#{activityId}
select count(*) from t_user_studio where studio_id=#{studioId}
